title:
<US Stocks>DJIA Closes 231 pts Lower but NVIDIA Hits New Closing High; AMD 
Rallies 8%
text: US Fed officials said that the authorities would cut interest rates at a prudent pace, and market expectations for an early rate cuts fell. The USD Index and 2- to 30-year US treasury yields increased broadly. US stocks closed lower on TuesdayThe DJIA closed 231.86 points or 0.62% lower at 37,361.12, while the S&P 500 closed 17.85 points or 0.37% lower at 4,765.98. The Nasdaq closed 28.41 points or 0.19% lower at 14,944.35.Related NewsInitial Jobless Claims in United States for Mar/23 is 210K, Below ForecastNVIDIA Corporation (NVDA.US)       closed 3.1% higher at US$563.82, a new historical closing high, while AMD (AMD.US)       also closed up 8.3%.(Real-time Streaming US Stocks Quote; Except All OTC quotes are at least 15 minutes delayed.)AAStocks Financial News
